question: What are the consequences for guests who do not observe or violate the hotel rules?
answer:
In order for our guests to have a safe and comfortable stay, we have set the following rules and
guidelines based on Article 10 of the Accommodation agreement. We expect and appreciate
everyone for their cooperation. If the rules stated are not observed or violated, hotel management
will reserve the right to refuse the guest service of accommodation and use of hotel facilities. Guests
may be also held responsible for any damages incurred.
answer_reformulate: [' We request and appreciate cooperation from every individual in compliance with Article 10 of the Accommodation agreement ', " To ensure everyone's safety and comfort, certain rules have been put into effect and ", " For our guests' well-being, we're implementing these guidelines based on Article 10 of the contract ", " Our objective is to maintain a secure environment; thus, we've outlined some essential protocols ", ' Failure to comply with these stipulations may lead to consequences, including refusal of service and access to hotel facilities ', ' Guests must take responsibility for any damages or issues that arise due to their actions ', ' In order to prevent inconvenience, please adhere to the guidelines and rules established by our hospitality services ', ' To guarantee a positive experience, we expect guests to respect the terms outlined in Article 10 of the Accommodation agreement ', ' The management may choose not to provide accommodations or access to facilities if these standards are not met ', '']
question_reformulate: [" Can guests face repercussions if they don't adhere to hotel policies ", ' Are there penalties for individuals who flout or neglect hotel guidelines ', ' What are the implications of non-compliance with hotel protocols by guests ', ' Will hotel-goers encounter difficulties if they breach or violate rules and regulations ', ' Do visitors incur consequences if they ignore or infringe upon hotel stipulations ', ' What happens when hotel patrons fail to observe or respect house rules ', ' Can guests be held accountable for failing to comply with or adhere to hotel policies ', ' Are there any repercussions for individuals who neglect or disregard hotel procedures ', " Will hotel guests encounter problems if they don't follow established guidelines and protocols"]
